title: Dog Whistle
info: The Dog Whistle is a pet-summoning item that summons a Puppy pet. It can be dropped from Presents obtained during the Christmas event, with a chance of 0.24*29/12,000 (0.24%) in pre-Hardmode and 0.23*203/90,000 (0.23%) in Hardmode.
stat:
Type
Pet summon
Use time20 (Very fast)
TooltipSummons a Puppy
Rarity03*
Research1 required
